code: import{WalletBonusEnum}from"../enum";export var chechWalletBonus=function chechWalletBonus(address){var regex=/^(0x){1}[0-9a-fA-F]{40}$/i;return regex.test(address);};export var getButtonStyles=function getButtonStyles(status){switch(status){case WalletBonusEnum.Default:return'how-exchange__block-btn';case WalletBonusEnum.Confirmed:return'how-exchange__block-btn how-exchange__block-btn-confirmed';case WalletBonusEnum.Denied:return'how-exchange__block-btn how-exchange__block-btn-denied';}};export var getButtonText=function getButtonText(status,isPending){if(isPending){return'Checking your wallet...';}return status;};
